metadata.name: empirical_anchor_box_v1
metadata.note: This configuration defines a minimal background-level empirical anchor for diagnostic use only. It is not a likelihood, fit, or parameter inference.

omega_lambda.interpretation: Effective vacuum energy fraction derived from the Phase 4 FRW toy background. Not assumed identical to the ΛCDM ΩΛ parameter.
omega_lambda.source_note: Broad, background-level observational guidance; schematic anchor only.

age_Gyr.interpretation: Cosmic age derived from FRW background integration.
age_Gyr.source_note: Broad age constraint used as a background sanity anchor, not a precision fit.
